code: import React from'react';import{Button,Card,Col,Container,Row}from'react-bootstrap';import styles from'../cssPage/potfolio.module.css';import{ProjectImg}from'../dataFolder/projetData';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Projects(){const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{id:"projects",className:"py-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:ProjectImg.map((project,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:6,className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:styles.projectCard,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:project.img[0],alt:"Project Thumbnail",className:styles.projectThumbnail}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:project===null||project===void 0?void 0:project.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{children:["This is a brief description of my ",project===null||project===void 0?void 0:project.name,"."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:()=>navigate(`/food/${project.id}`),className:styles.viewButton,children:"View Project"})]})]})},idx))})})});}export default Projects;
